Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Provides a controlled interface to the various styling objects.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BackboneStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the backbone style.
Controller The abstract class for style controllers.
FeatureHolderStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
FileWriterManager This class is responsible for controlling access to file writing.
GenomeDataController This class controls access to the GenomeData object and provides methods for operating on that data.
GlobalStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the global style.
GUIController The GUI controller is responsible for maintaining a single instance of the GUI in it's entirety.
LabelStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the label styles.
LabelStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
LegendItemStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
LegendStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the legend styles.
LegendStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PlotStyleController This class is responsible for controlling all access to the plot style by GUI elements.
PlotStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PropertyMappableToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
PropertyMapperController This class is responsible for controlling access to the property mappers.
RulerStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the ruler style.
SetStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the feature holder styles.
SlotItemStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
SlotStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the slot styles.
SlotStyleToken This class is responsible for providing access to it's associated style to ONLY the controllers, which is achieved by using "protected final" method specifiers and by having the controllers and tokens in the same package.
StyleController This class is responsible for managing meta-level information regarding all the style controllers.
TooltipStyleController This class is responsible for controlling access to the tool tip style.
 

Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers Description

Provides a controlled interface to the various styling objects.
